message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm asking for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value this product holds. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can we meet at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I'm motivated to sell, I need to be closer to $11,000 for this to make sense. Would you be willing to consider that?
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit far from my target. Would you be willing to consider $9,000?
